verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, who shall <S%H1481>abide<s%> in thy <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>? who shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%>? abide: Heb. sojourn
He that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> <S%H8549>uprightly<s%>, and <S%H6466>worketh<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%> in his <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

He that <S%H7270>backbiteth<s%> not with his <S%H3956>tongue<s%>, nor <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>, nor taketh <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> against his <S%H7138>neighbour<s%>. taketh: or, receiveth, or, endureth

In whose <S%H5869>eyes<s%> a vile <S%H3988>person<s%> is <S%H959>contemned<s%>; but he <S%H3513>honoureth<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. He that <S%H7650>sweareth<s%> to his own <S%H7489>hurt<s%>, and <S%H4171>changeth<s%> not.

He that putteth not <S%H5414>out<s%> his <S%H3701>money<s%> to <S%H5392>usury<s%>, nor <S%H3947>taketh<s%> <S%H7810>reward<s%> against the <S%H5355>innocent<s%>. He that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> these things shall <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.
